name: neighbour
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A2 someone who lives very close to you: Some of the neighbours have complained about the noise from our party. Have you met Pat, my next-door neighbour?
B1 a country that is next to another country: The relationship between Scotland and its southern neighbour (= England) has not always been peaceful.
More examplesFewer examplesMy wife checks on our elderly neighbour every few days to make sure that he's alright.The children were saved from the fire only because a neighbour pulled them clear.It was a bitter civil war, that pitted neighbour against neighbour.I've asked my neighbour to water the plants while I'm away.The government warned its neighbours not to interfere in its internal affairs.
